trans-unit.source: Provides extensible Application Markup Language (XAML) serialization services for an <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Activity"></xref> at design time.
trans-unit.target: Fornece serviços de serialização extensible Application Markup Language (XAML) para um <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Activity"> </xref> em tempo de design.

trans-unit.source: > [!NOTE] > [!INCLUDE[DeprecatedContent](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)] ActivityMarkupSerializer provides methods that serialize activity class objects into XAML format and deserialize XAML content into activity class objects.
trans-unit.target: > [!NOTE] > [!INCLUDE[DeprecatedContent](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)]ActivityMarkupSerializer fornece métodos que serializar objetos da classe de atividade em formato XAML e desserializar o conteúdo XAML em objetos da classe de atividade.

trans-unit.source: These services are primarily used by activity designers to persist the classes on the workflow design surface.
trans-unit.target: Esses serviços são usados principalmente por designers de atividade para manter as classes na superfície de design de fluxo de trabalho.

trans-unit.source: For more information about serialization, see [Serialization](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).
trans-unit.target: Para obter mais informações sobre serialização, consulte [serialização](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Serialization.ActivityMarkupSerializer"></xref> class.
trans-unit.target: Inicializa uma nova instância do <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Serialization.ActivityMarkupSerializer"> </xref> classe.

trans-unit.source: Creates an instance of the specified <xref:System.Type> using the specified <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Serialization.WorkflowMarkupSerializationManager"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Cria uma instância especificada <xref:System.Type>usando especificado <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Serialization.WorkflowMarkupSerializationManager"> </xref>.</xref:System.Type>

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Serialization.WorkflowMarkupSerializationManager"></xref> to use in this instance creation.
trans-unit.target: O <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Serialization.WorkflowMarkupSerializationManager"> </xref> para usar na criação de instância.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Type> to create.
trans-unit.target: O <xref:System.Type>criem.</xref:System.Type>

trans-unit.source: A reference to the newly created <xref:System.Object>.
trans-unit.target: Uma referência para o <xref:System.Object>.</xref:System.Object> recém-criado

trans-unit.source: The index of the last character in the activity definition.
trans-unit.target: O índice do último caractere na definição da atividade.

trans-unit.source: To be added.
trans-unit.target: A ser adicionado.

trans-unit.source: The index of the last line in the activity definition.
trans-unit.target: O índice da última linha na definição da atividade.

trans-unit.source: To be added.
trans-unit.target: A ser adicionado.

trans-unit.source: Notifies the <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Serialization.ActivityMarkupSerializer"></xref> that an object has just been serialized.
trans-unit.target: Notifica o <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Serialization.ActivityMarkupSerializer"> </xref> que tem um objeto apenas foi serializado.

trans-unit.source: OnAfterSerialize is called immediately after the <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Serialization.WorkflowMarkupSerializer.Serialize%2A> method runs and performs post-serialization processing on `obj`, primarily formatting and indenting code and extensible Application Markup Language (XAML) in the .xoml file.
trans-unit.target: OnAfterSerialize é chamado imediatamente após o <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Serialization.WorkflowMarkupSerializer.Serialize%2A>método é executado e realiza o processamento de pós-serialização em `obj`, principalmente Formatar e recuar código e XAML extensible Application Markup Language () no arquivo. xoml.</xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Serialization.WorkflowMarkupSerializer.Serialize%2A>

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Serialization.WorkflowMarkupSerializationManager"></xref> that manages the serialization process.
trans-unit.target: O <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Serialization.WorkflowMarkupSerializationManager"> </xref> que gerencia o processo de serialização.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Object> that was serialized.
trans-unit.target: O <xref:System.Object>que foi serializado.</xref:System.Object>

trans-unit.source: Notifies the <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Serialization.ActivityMarkupSerializer"></xref> that an object is about to be serialized.
trans-unit.target: Notifica o <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Serialization.ActivityMarkupSerializer"> </xref> que um objeto está prestes a ser serializado.

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Serialization.ActivityMarkupSerializer.OnAfterSerialize%2A> is called immediately before the <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Serialization.WorkflowMarkupSerializer.Serialize%2A> method runs on the activity specified by `obj`.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Serialization.ActivityMarkupSerializer.OnAfterSerialize%2A>é chamado imediatamente antes do <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Serialization.WorkflowMarkupSerializer.Serialize%2A>método é executado sobre a atividade especificada pelo `obj`.</xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Serialization.WorkflowMarkupSerializer.Serialize%2A></xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Serialization.ActivityMarkupSerializer.OnAfterSerialize%2A>

trans-unit.source: OnBeforeSerialize writes the opening extensible Application Markup Language (XAML) tag for the activity, including any required attributes.
trans-unit.target: OnBeforeSerialize grava a extensible Application Markup Language (XAML) à marca de abertura para a atividade, incluindo todos os atributos exigidos.

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Serialization.WorkflowMarkupSerializationManager"></xref> that manages the serialization process.
trans-unit.target: O <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Serialization.WorkflowMarkupSerializationManager"> </xref> que gerencia o processo de serialização.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Object> to be serialized.
trans-unit.target: O <xref:System.Object>a ser serializado.</xref:System.Object>

trans-unit.source: serializationManager, obj, or writer contains a null reference ( in Visual Basic).
trans-unit.target: serializationManager, obj, ou writer contém uma referência nula ( no Visual Basic).

trans-unit.source: obj is not of type .
trans-unit.target: objnão é do tipo .

trans-unit.source: The index of the first character in the activity definition.
trans-unit.target: O índice do primeiro caractere na definição da atividade.

trans-unit.source: To be added.
trans-unit.target: A ser adicionado.

trans-unit.source: The index of the first line in the activity definition.
trans-unit.target: O índice da primeira linha na definição da atividade.

trans-unit.source: To be added.
trans-unit.target: A ser adicionado.
